main event: Unidentified round, bright white object was observed between Claremore and Tulsa, Oklahoma on 7/4/52.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 20 to 40 feet in diameter.
The object was observed visually for 2-3 minutes.
The object performed a straight, rapid flight and then stopped abruptly.
